name: PWR SRG
description:
This is the first game i have ever made in full. I hope it’s kinda fun. I would love to add more to it (and plan to), but this is about as far as I could get. Did all the art, music and sound myself (sound effects are my mouth).

Cheers and can’t wait to play all the other games.

CONTROLS -> arrow keys move the helicopter, space bar launches your missles. DESTROY ALL THE ROBOTS BEFORE THEY DESTROY THE POWER STATION… OR YOU!
